Text: Hi, please could you seed your femme.fatales.s01e01 torrent if at all possible? Am only getting 1kps [and all other torrents are fine] thank you for everything you share here : )
@dosanko: I seed my torrents at full speed until there are 10 other seeders and then I cut back, but I am still seeding. If they hit and run I have no control over that.

thank you very much for your reply. I understand as especially with on a public tracker sadly people do hit and run. 

I can still see 3 seeds, but the average speed still remains 1-3k per second. I've tried all over and this seems to be the last live torrent in this quality. I guess I'll have to give up ; /  Thanks for everything you share here though : )
@dosanko: Why give up, just let it run and you will eventually get the files. I waited for one for over six months because it was only D/L @2-3kbps, but I got the file.
